Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{3: 'You expected the arcade to be popular, but this is beyond anything you imagined.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Countless people crowd around a strength-testing punching machine. Who knew these pre-Golden Age arcade games could be so popular? Among the crowd, you notice familiar bright red hair.'}
{2: '(Noctis?)', 3: '11', 4: "(What's he doing here?)", 5: '11'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'I strongly protest the destructive behavior of this Babylonia Construct in Constellia!', 4: '18'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Oh no. Noctis has caused another scene.)', 3: '17'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Driven by curiosity, you squeeze through the crowd and see a punching machine warped and broken from excessive force. The furious vendor curses angrily at Noctis, who stands there without a care.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Destructive behavior? Please. These salvaged Golden Age antiques are just too fragile. I barely touched it and it broke on its own.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'Dissatisfied: Unacceptable behavior! This is complete circuit spaghetti! Conveying demand: Construct Noctis must repair the damage and provide compensation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Circuit spaghetti? Now that actually sounds kind of tasty. Repair it? Not really my specialty. Want me to try punching it in reverse with the same force instead?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seriously doubting Noctis\' idea of "fixing it with a punch" would end well, you quickly stop him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: '【kuroname】? Commandant! Perfect timing!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis grabs you like you're his savior and prepares to introduce you grandly."}
{2: 'Huh?', 3: '32', 4: "Don't drag me into this, Noctis!", 5: '32'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "(Whispers) Help me out here, Commandant. I really don't know how to fix stuff!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Vendor, do you know who this is? It's 【kuroname】, Gray Raven's Commandant, the hero of humanity! If anyone can fix it, it's 【kuroname】!", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right, the one and only!", 3: '39', 4: 'Me? Do I really know how to fix this?', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'Identity confirmed: Commandant 【kuroname】. Requesting compensation from Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Why do I feel like you're just using me?", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "How about this, 【kuroname】? Help me sort out this mess, and I'll take you somewhere amazing. I promise it's an experience you've never had before!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Then it's decided!", 3: '43', 4: 'Alright then.', 5: '43'}
{3: 'You take out your terminal and make some quick calls. Soon, the Engineering Force agrees to send someone to handle the repairs.'}
{2: "I've already contacted Babylonia's repair team. Someone will be here shortly to fix this.", 3: '45'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "After giving the repair team's contact info to the vendor, the arcade incident is finally settled. To thank you, Noctis hands you a large cup of freshly squeezed juice."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "All sorted? I knew you'd handle it. This one's yours.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Gulp gulp gulp...)', 3: '53', 4: "That's done. Now, where's this amazing place you mentioned?", 5: '53'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Heh, you'll see. It's gonna blow your mind.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory687.jpg'}

{3: "You're now standing at the top of a towering windmill, high above Constellia. Noctis is in front of you, wearing something that can only be described as a ridiculous custom wingsuit. He spreads his arms theatrically."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Well? Ever seen anything like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I didn't know you could wingsuit.", 3: '61', 4: 'So this "amazing place" was actually for wingsuit flying?', 5: '61'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What, you already know about it? Man, I've been holding back this whole time so I could surprise you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Wait, you've tried it before, haven't you? Beat me to it? Seriously, does F.O.S. teach you everything?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'F.O.S. just mentioned it once. Said it used to be a luxury extreme sport from the Golden Age.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Extreme sport? I always thought it was some high-stakes infiltration technique. Well, either way, if you haven't done it, I'm taking you now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you sure this is safe?', 3: '69', 4: 'I remember Vera warning me not to get into anything piloted by you.', 5: '69'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I figured you'd say that. That's why I came prepared.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png'}
{3: 'As if to prove his skill, Noctis pulls out his terminal and shows you a video of himself flying through the sky. In the footage, Noctis flows with ease, gliding through the air like a bird.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory687.jpg'}
{2: 'Most of my experience has been in transport flights or parachuting...', 3: '78'}
{2: "Guess it's time to try something different.", 3: '79'}

{3: "Noctis expertly straps you in front of him. Despite his usual loud personality, he's surprisingly careful as he checks every buckle and strap. Even his voice lowers a bit as he explains safety measures."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Alright, 【kuroname】, you ready? We're about to conquer the sky.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory687.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Far below, the festival still buzzes with life. But up here, no one notices as two figures, like birds, leap from the top of the windmill tower and dive into open air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Woohoo! How does it feel, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}

{3: 'The wind screams past your ears. Gravity pulls, steady and strong. You fall slower than you imagined, but your heart pounds like a drum. Every logical thought is stripped away by the rush of air...'}
{3: 'With Noctis holding firm and the wingsuit fully deployed, the two of you glide like a single bird cutting through the sky.'}
{3: 'The air is crisp and cold, but the warmth of his chest against your back keeps you grounded.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Don't look down, 【kuroname】. Look ahead. There, see? You're flying, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'His words yank your thoughts back into focus. You shift your gaze forward and finally see it.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1017.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1017.jpg'}
{3: 'The horizon curves gently. The sky stretches endlessly. A pale blue canopy above. A battered planet below.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1016.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1016.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{3: 'As you glide farther, new sights slowly rise from beyond the horizon. The beauty of it loosens every last knot of tension.'}
{3: 'Watching Constellia grow smaller below, one very important question finally comes to mind—one that Noctis never addressed.'}
{2: 'Noctis... how are we getting back?', 3: '132'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}
{3: "The good news: you didn't land too far from Constellia. The bad news: neither of you has any way to get back."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So? 【kuroname】, I bet this was the most exciting part of the festival for you, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, flying really was exciting.', 3: '142', 4: "Of course, walking all the way back, that's a different kind of thrill.", 5: '142'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Then it's time for something even more exciting: award ceremony!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Wait, what? There's an award ceremony?", 3: '145', 4: '...An award ceremony?', 5: '145'}
{3: 'Noctis pulls out a crudely made certificate from who-knows-where and hands it to you. Your name, 【kuroname】, is already written on it. Looks like he planned this all along.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Awarded personally by the great Noctis, the first wingsuit flight certificate since the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I know you\'re probably gonna say something like "The view was reward enough," or whatever. But that doesn\'t fly with me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Now we're the only two people in the world with flight certificates. Next time we fly, we do it together again. Deal?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Today was amazing. I won't forget it.", 3: '157'}

{2: 'And for the record, just because we flew together doesn\'t mean we\'re "Love Birds in Flight". You might want to rethink that title.', 3: '158', 4: 'Hold on, why does it say "Love Birds in Flight"?', 5: '158', 6: '"Love Birds in Flight"? So that\'s what you think it means?', 7: '158'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Huh? I don't know! It just sounded cool, okay?! Let's just go already!", 4: '1'}
